summary: The Daily Mail is a popular British newspaper, first published in 1896. It's known for its wide readership, especially among older adults and women. With over 1 million copies sold daily, it's the UK's best-selling paid newspaper. The paper has won many awards but has also faced criticism for its sensationalist content and inaccuracies. Its online version, MailOnline, is very popular, attracting millions of visitors monthly. The newspaper is owned by the Daily Mail and General Trust, with Jonathan Harmsworth as the main shareholder.
title: Daily Mail
